metadata.title: 5.0 magnitude quake jolts Swat, surrounding areas

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 26 (APP): A 5.0 magnitude earthquake struck Swat and nearby areas on Saturday, rushing the residents out of their homes and offices in fear. According to the Pakistan Meteorological Department, the quake originated at a depth of 130 kilometres, with its epicentre located in Afghanistan's Hindu Kush region, as reported a private news channel. Officials confirmed that no casualties or significant damage were reported following the tremors.
